statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, created_at FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND category LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS product_count, category FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING product_count > 2 ORDER BY product_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT MAX(customer_id) AS max_customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM product_history WHERE purchased = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM product_history WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_browsing_history WHERE browsing_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_purchases
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY product_id DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT product_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_browsing_history GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM product_recommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_score > 0.7 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT MAX(recommendation_score) AS max_score, MIN(recommendation_score) AS min_score FROM product_recommendations
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 3);
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM Customer;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customer INNER JOIN Purchase ON Customer.customer_id = Purchase.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customer c JOIN Purchase p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_price > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_date FROM Customer c JOIN Recommendation r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
